summary: that anon who genuinely thinks dnp’s closeness is a fabricated marketing ploy, oof— heteronormativity is a hell of a drug 😔✊...
question: that anon who genuinely thinks dnp’s closeness is a fabricated marketing ploy, oof— heteronormativity is a hell of a drug 😔✊ hope they get clean soon
answer: there are still people out there that believe so and it bugs me tbh. this last anon says they left the fandom, so i guess that’s ok, but there are people that are still in the fandom, claim they like dnp, and still think they are lying to us for money. that hurts

blog.name: phanbliss
blog.title: you don't have to say 'i love you' to say i love you
blog.description: Monika | she/her. I'm from Poland and I write fics. Ablissa on AO3.

summary: No offense, but I think they are. It's kind of the reason I left the fandom. I think they're just trying to give their audience...
question: No offense, but I think they are. It's kind of the reason I left the fandom. I think they're just trying to give their audience enough to keep following them because it's evident how much they want them to be dating and freak out when they show intimacy and stuff that insinuates. Not saying that's the main reason people follow them and like them but it's a huge part which their management must obviously be aware of. There's nothing wrong, Just be conscious of the media you consume, that's all.
answer:
are you the same anon? anyway, i spoke about this at length recently (and i really mean at length lol i don’t think you want to read that) but i’ll keep it shorter now.

you are allowed to have your opinion, but how can you ignore so many facts? it’s not all in our heads, you know. there are actual facts, things that happened and continue to happen, that indicate 1) they’re not straight (i mean, at this point i don’t know how anyone can think they are) and 2) they’re in a relationship. 

why is it easier to dismiss nearly 10 years of things that AT THE VERY LEAST heavily imply a romantic relationship, than to believe that two men might not be straight, might be together, and simply choose to keep it ~mildly~ under the wraps? i honestly wish i could understand, please don’t feel attacked.

you are allowed to have your opinion, but how can you ignore so many facts? it’s not all in our heads, you know. there are actual facts, things that happened and continue to happen, that indicate 1) they’re not straight (i mean, at this point i don’t know how anyone can think they are) and 2) they’re in a relationship. 

why is it easier to dismiss nearly 10 years of things that AT THE VERY LEAST heavily imply a romantic relationship, than to believe that two men might not be straight, might be together, and simply choose to keep it ~mildly~ under the wraps? i honestly wish i could understand, please don’t feel attacked.

you are allowed to have your opinion, but how can you ignore so many facts? it’s not all in our heads, you know. there are actual facts, things that happened and continue to happen, that indicate 1) they’re not straight (i mean, at this point i don’t know how anyone can think they are) and 2) they’re in a relationship. 

why is it easier to dismiss nearly 10 years of things that AT THE VERY LEAST heavily imply a romantic relationship, than to believe that two men might not be straight, might be together, and simply choose to keep it ~mildly~ under the wraps? i honestly wish i could understand, please don’t feel attacked.
trail.content:

summary: From Among The Stars [A Plant Boy! and Space Boy! AU]
title: From Among The Stars [A Plant Boy! and Space Boy! AU]
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TtjRI4

by Annalise_Neufeld

“Are you… human?”

Philip Lester is a sprite, living in the heart of a dense forest in England. His ability to connect with the Earth through plants sets him apart from humans, so he remains in solitude for the majority of his days despite his human appearance and mostly human lifestyle. He takes care of the forest around him, perfectly content with his quiet, unassuming life.

A spaceship crashing into his forest is unexpected. The man crawling from the burning wreck is even more so.

The mysterious boy from a mysterious, far-off planet gives Phil the perfect opportunity to learn what it truly means to be human. Together, they learn how to co-exist and love in a world that never intended to collide with space.

“Not exactly. Some call me a faerie, others call me a sprite. I’m more of a guardian of the forest that doesn’t exactly fit into any of those labels.”

Words: 1161, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF), Daniel Howell (Youtube), Philip Lester (Youtube)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Daniel Howell, Philip Lester
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: plant boy au, space boy au, alternative universe, Outer Space, Forests, Dan crash-lands on Earth, Phil is a forest guardian, Fluff and Angst, Implied/Referenced Rape/Non-con, Gay, they have a wolf as a pet, Getting to Know Each Other, Alien Cultural Differences

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Is this fun for you because some of the anons are horrible. I have a feeling your going to see more drama based on that last...
question: Is this fun for you because some of the anons are horrible. I have a feeling your going to see more drama based on that last anon. when will the drama stop being fun.
answer: I don’t know why that last anon decided to come out of the blue like that, but most of the discussions on this blog aren’t that flammable, so overall, yes, this is fun for me most of the time.

reblog.comment: I don’t know why that last anon decided to come out of the blue like that, but most of the discussions on this blog aren’t that flammable, so overall, yes, this is fun for me most of the time.

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

“Not exactly. Some call me a faerie, others call me a sprite. I’m more of a guardian of the forest that doesn’t exactly fit into any of those labels.”

by Annalise_Neufeld

“Are you… human?”

Philip Lester is a sprite, living in the heart of a dense forest in England. His ability to connect with the Earth through plants sets him apart from humans, so he remains in solitude for the majority of his days despite his human appearance and mostly human lifestyle. He takes care of the forest around him, perfectly content with his quiet, unassuming life.

A spaceship crashing into his forest is unexpected. The man crawling from the burning wreck is even more so.

The mysterious boy from a mysterious, far-off planet gives Phil the perfect opportunity to learn what it truly means to be human. Together, they learn how to co-exist and love in a world that never intended to collide with space.

“Not exactly. Some call me a faerie, others call me a sprite. I’m more of a guardian of the forest that doesn’t exactly fit into any of those labels.”

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Offensive as in jokes about the word f*g, incest, etc.
question: Offensive as in jokes about the word f*g, incest, etc.
answer:
I guess it depends. Any joke, offensive or not, can be funny given the appropriate timing, context, and general reaction. An example that comes to mind is the time Dan liked that tweet from the French Dan Howell account on Twitter that said something like “extra Longue baguette for brek- just Call moi une fagguette” And personally, I thought that was pretty funny. And Dan liked the tweet, so it seems like he wasn’t upset about it.


But, when it comes to offensive humour, you just have to know your audience. And, context matters. So that needs to be taken into account as well. So I really don’t have a yes or no answer here. I’d judge that on a case by case basis.

And Dan liked the tweet, so it seems like he wasn’t upset about it.


But, when it comes to offensive humour, you just have to know your audience. And, context matters. So that needs to be taken into account as well. So I really don’t have a yes or no answer here. I’d judge that on a case by case basis.

But, when it comes to offensive humour, you just have to know your audience. And, context matters. So that needs to be taken into account as well. So I really don’t have a yes or no answer here. I’d judge that on a case by case basis.

summary:
Michael Scott - huge Phillie and ships phan... not quiet about it and makes lots of sexual jokes about phan.
Dwight Schrute -...
body:
Michael Scott - huge Phillie and ships phan… not quiet about it and makes lots of sexual jokes about phan.

Dwight Schrute - appreciates Phil’s love of houseplants. Ships Dan and Phil but will kill you if you say anything about it.

Angela Martin - disgusted by the idea of Dan and Phil being a couple. Secretly loves Dan but does not like his use of bad language.

Pam Beesly - HUGE phannie, thinks they’re both adorable.

Jim Halpert - watches Dan and Phil because Pam loves them, casual fan of both.

Andy Bernard - big Dannie and is NOT quiet about it.

Kelly Kapoor - introduced everyone to Dan and Phil, huge phannie but likes Dan more than Phil.

Meredith Palmer - wants to fuck both of them

Ryan Howard - pretends to hate them because he wants to piss Kelly off. Loves Phil though.

Creed Bratton - confused as to what’s going on but likes them

Kevin Malone - thinks it’s obvious Dan and Phil are dating. Loves both of them

Stanley Hudson - wouldn’t be caught dead watching dan and phil. Hates them.

Toby Flenderson - big ass phillie

Phyllis Vance - thinks Phil is handsome and very sweet also loves Dan.

Darryl Philbin - definitely a phillie

Erin Hannon - BIG DANNIE but totally ships it

Holly Flax - also a huge Phillie but an even bigger Dannie (don’t tell Michael though)

Jan Levinson - one of those gross Dannies

Oscar Martinez - phannie for sure. Loves their relationship and both of them equally.
